comment.author: 59573650@N06
comment._content:
Also a must see, but try to get a good day.  If it is windy it will be cold up there, but if it is
the only day for you...go!!  There is a parking lot near by and a bit of a walk up to the top
of the Cliffs.  Beware of the Goats and don't pet them or you will smell them all day!!  :)
This is a must see!!!!

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: Thanks for all your travel tips, especially this word of warning about the goats!
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons
